title: 2 BR, 1 BA Townhouse-Style Apartment for Rent - Clyde Ave
app_fee: $40 for credit, employment, background, and criminal records check
posting_body: ['2 BR, 1 BA Townhouse-Style Apartment for Rent', 'Apartment viewings now being scheduled for a townhouse-style, 8 unit apartment building at 1051 Clyde Avenue in Cuyahoga Falls.', 'Features:', "-\t2 bedrooms (10'x11'), 1 bathroom, kitchen, dining/living room combo (10'x20'), carpet", '-\t1 car garage, parking for more vehicles, Under-stair storage', '-\tRefrigerator, electric oven/stove, dishwasher, garbage disposal', '-\tElectric washer/dryer hookups, central A/C, forced air gas heating', '-\tFront and back balconies', '-\tResponsible pet owners welcome', 'Location:', '-\tClose to Route 8 and the Chapel Hill Mall', '-\tNear corners of Tallmadge Rd., Buchholzer Rd., and Howe Ave.', 'Pricing:', '-\t1 year lease (negotiable)', '-\t$200 additional pet deposit (if applicable)', '-\t$50 per month per pet (if applicable)', '-\tOwner pays trash, storm-water', '-\tTenant pays inexpensive, city-leveraged utilities of H2O, gas, electric']
